summary: In 1830s France, pianist/composer Frédéric Chopin is pursued romantically by the determined, individualistic woman who uses the name George Sand.
cast: Judy Davis|Hugh Grant|Mandy Patinkin|Bernadette Peters|Julian Sands|Ralph Brown|Georges Corraface|Anton Rodgers|Emma Thompson|Anna Massey|David Birkin|Nimer Rashed|Fiona Vincente|John Savident|Lucy Speed|Elizabeth Spriggs|Jezabelle Amato|Claude Berthy|André Chaumeau|Nicholas Hawtrey|Isabelle Guiard|Fernand Guiot|Sylvie Herbert|Annette Milsom|Jean-Michel Dagory|François Lalande|Ian Marshall de Garnier|Dale Scott-Giry|Stuart Seide
title: Pasiones privadas de una mujer
